text: Oswaldo de Barros Velloso (25 August 1908 – 8 August 1996) pois a former Brazilian football player. He has played for Brazil national team. ==Honours== ===Club=== * Campeonato Baiano (1): :Bahiano de Tênis: 1927 ===National=== * Copa Río Branco (1): :Brazil: 1931 ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile at Globo Esporte's Futpedia Category:1908 births Category:1996 deaths Category:Brazilian association football goalkeepers Category:Footballers from Mato Grosso do Sul Category:1930 FIFA World Cup players
title: Velloso (footballer, born 1908)
